page.title: 17FAMOUS PEOPLE
page.content: {FAMOUS LOCAL POET As far as we are aware, few former Wylam residents have ever been called obituaries in the times paper! But the late Basil Bunting, a poet who lived on Elm Bank Road during the 1970s, did so with a substantial entry following his death on the 17th April at the age of 85. The quality of his poetry was not widely recognized until the mid-1960s, but in recent years the critics have regarded him as one of the finest living English poets. Wylam is pleased to have him as a former resident.
